item.title: Sony Pictures Television Reups Movie Slate Deal With Turkish Pay Operator Sinema TV
item.description: Sony Pictures Television has extended its first-run feature film slate deal with Turkish pay TV operator Sinema TV. This new agreement re-ups a similar deal inked in 2021 and bolsters the close rappor

item.title: AI-Generated Doc ‘Post Truth’ Sets International Launch at Warsaw Film Festival, Reveals Trailer (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Pioneering AI-generated feature-length documentary “Post Truth,” which got a theatrical release across Turkey this summer, is set to launch internationally from the upcoming Warsaw Film Fes

item.title: ‘My Brilliant Friend’ Gets Turkish Adaptation From OGM Pictures
item.description: Elena Ferrante’s beloved Neapolitan novels are heading to Turkey. Wildside, The Apartment, Fremantle and Fandango are partnering with OGM Pictures to produce the first scripted format adaptation
